channel.title: writing on Khanh Nghiem
channel.description: Recent content in writing on Khanh Nghiem

item.title: Vietnam Month Three Recap
item.description: I turned 25. It feels unreal that I had past the middle mark of my 20s. My 25th birthday went by like any other day. I clocked into work at 8:30 in the morning, raced against the deadline to package a new version of my team’s software, had lunch and coffee by myself at the office, did the same work for a few more hours before clocking out at 5:30.

item.title: Vietnam Month Two Recap
item.description: I made a commitment to write a reflection post every month to capture the highlights of my journey back home in Vietnam. I decided to unpublish my first post to rewrite it and republish at a later time.

item.title: Why you should practice writing
item.description: Lately, I have been obsessed with Janelle Monáe. This obsession began with her latest album “Dirty Computer”. I admire how articulate and thoughtful she is with everything that she does. So I did what any true fan would do: I tried to watch as many interviews with Janelle Monáe as possible.
